document.forum_title: Latest Big News Network RSS Feeds
document.topic_text: Las Vegas Review Journal Monday 25th April, 2016 North Las Vegas police are investigating a fatal crash involving a moped Sunday night.The crash happened about 9 p.m. in the 3300 block of West Lake Mead Boulevard near Pecos Road, said North Las Vegas police public information officer Ann Cavaricci said.One man was pronounced dead at the scene.This is a developing story. Check back for updates.Contact Jessica Terrones at...
